name: Kingdom of Shapiya
description:
OH NO! THE EVIL SHAPES ARE COMING... AGAIN

Kingdom of Shapiya is a first-person tower defense strategy game. You must defeat endless waves of Enemy Shapes using a variety of weapons and defense towers. Visit The Shop to upgrade your defenses and unlock new weapons by spending accumulated Hex Coins. 

Take a look at the Gameplay and Control screens within the options menu for more information about Kingdom of Shapiya.
